name: Beary Hungry
description:
The story focuses on a bear named Beary, who just awoke from hibernation. he collects food throughout the four seasons to prepare for the next winter hibernation. Along the way he befriends woodland creatures that will help Beary traverse the land and avoid enemy predators.

Beary Hungry’s theme is a friendly and educational journey that teaches children about hibernation and it culminates into a happy ending.

Made with - 

Unity 2017.2.0f3

Contributors:
